Name: Jade Vault
Script: On Execute: var item=actualdice[0].basevalue; if(item==1){giveequipment(~Jade Calculator~|true|false|e);} if(item==2){giveequipment(~Jade Machine~| true| false| e);} if(item==3){giveequipment(~Jade Blade~| true| false| e);} if(item==4){giveequipment(~Jade Skull~| true| false| e);} if(item==5){giveequipment(~Jade Pendant~| true| false| e);} if(item==6){giveequipment(~Jade Clock~| true| false| e);}

Name: Jade Vault_upgraded
Script: On Execute: var item=actualdice[0].basevalue; if(item==1){giveequipment(~Jade Calculator+~| true| false| e);} if(item==2){giveequipment(~Jade Machine+~| true| false| e);} if(item==3){giveequipment(~Jade Blade+~| true| false| e);} if(item==4){giveequipment(~Jade Skull+~| true| false| e);} if(item==5){giveequipment(~Jade Pendant+~| true| false| e);} if(item==6){giveequipment(~Jade Clock+~| true| false| e);}

Name: Jade Vault_downgraded
Description: Contains a slightly less | powerful item
Script: On Execute: var item=actualdice[0].basevalue; if(item==1){giveequipment(~Jade Calculator-~| true| false| e);} if(item==2){giveequipment(~Jade Machine-~| true| false| e);} if(item==3){giveequipment(~Jade Blade-~| true| false| e);} if(item==4){giveequipment(~Jade Skull-~| true| false| e);} if(item==5){giveequipment(~Jade Pendant-~| true| false| e);} if(item==6){giveequipment(~Jade Clock-~| true| false| e);}

Name: Jade Calculator
Description: Bump unused dice[;] twice | [grey](Vault relocks after combat)
Script: On Execute: var c = 0; var extradice = []; for (mydice in self.dicepool){ if (mydice.available()){ if (mydice.basevalue >= 5){ extradice.push(1); if(mydice.basevalue >= 6){extradice.push(1);} mydice.animatereroll(6| self.screenposition()| c * 0.05); } else { mydice.animatereroll((mydice.basevalue + 2)| self.screenposition()| c * 0.05); } c++; } } givedice(extradice);
Script: On Start Turn: //if(turn == 1) { e.animate(~flashandshake~);sfx(~_lock~); giveequipment(~Jade Vault~| true| false| e);}

Name: I'm Outta Here!
Description: Odd: flee[;] Even: win|(for testing only)
Script: On Execute: if(d%2 == 0){ attack(999); sfx(~_shield~); } else { flee(); sfx(~_shield~); }

Name: Muda Muda Muda
Description: Throw your dice[;]| do [sword]2 damage for each

Name: Muda Muda Muda_upgraded
Description: Throw your dice[;]| do [sword]2 damage for each | ([sword]3 on [dice]>3)
Script: On Execute: var c = 0; for(mydice in self.dicepool){ if(mydice.available()){if(mydice.basevalue>=4){var dmg=3;}else{var dmg=2;} attack(dmg); mydice.removedice(self.screenposition());} }

Name: Muda Muda Muda_downgraded
Description: Throw your dice[;] do [sword]1 damage for each
Script: On Execute: var c = 0; for(mydice in self.dicepool){ if(mydice.available()){attack(1); mydice.removedice(self.screenposition());} }

Name: High Stakes
Script: On Execute: var dicelist = []; for (mydice in self.dicepool){ if (mydice.available()){ dicelist.push(mydice); } } if(dicelist.length > 0) { shuffle(dicelist); givedice(dicelist[0].basevalue); attack(d); adjustrobotcounter(dicelist[0].basevalue);}
Script: On Start Turn: e.animate(~flashandshake~); e.availablethisturn = false;

Name: Cataclysm
Script: On Execute: attack(d); var status = shuffle([BLIND|CURSE|LOCK|FIRE|ICE|WEAKEN|SHOCK|POISON|CONFUSE|VANISH]); for(i in 1 ... d){inflict(status(i)|1);}

Name: Combat Roll@SDD
Script: On Execute: var outcome = []; for(i in 1 ... d) { outcome.push(i); } if(d<=1){givedice(1);}else{givedice(rand(outcome));}
Script: On Start Turn: var give = []; if(chance(25)){ give = shuffle([~Combat Key~|~Combat Lock~|~Combat Doppel~|~Combat Spanner~]);} else{give=shuffle([~Combat Roll@SDD~|~Combat Spatula@SDD~|~Combat Bump~|~Combat Nudge~]);} self.replaceskillcard(give[0]);

Name: Combat Bump
Script: On Start Turn: var give = []; if(chance(25)){ give = shuffle([~Combat Key~|~Combat Lock~|~Combat Doppel~|~Combat Spanner~]);} else{give=shuffle([~Combat Roll@SDD~|~Combat Spatula@SDD~|~Combat Bump~|~Combat Nudge~]);} self.replaceskillcard(give[0]);

Name: Combat Key
Description: Set an unused dice to <d6>[;]|Return this dice|(Reuseable)
Script: On Execute: var dicelist = []; for (mydice in self.dicepool){ if (mydice.available() && mydice.basevalue != d){ dicelist.push(mydice); } } if(dicelist.length > 0) { shuffle(dicelist); dicelist[0].animatereroll(d| self.screenposition()| 0); } givedice(d);
Script: On Start Turn: var give = []; if(chance(25)){ give = shuffle([~Combat Key~|~Combat Lock~|~Combat Doppel~|~Combat Spanner~]);} else{give=shuffle([~Combat Roll@SDD~|~Combat Spatula@SDD~|~Combat Bump~|~Combat Nudge~]);} self.replaceskillcard(give[0]);

Name: Become PU

Name: Controlled PU
Script: On Execute: var give = [~Combat Key~|~Combat Lock~|~Combat Doppel~|~Combat Spanner~|~Combat Roll@SDD~|~Combat Spatula@SDD~|~Combat Bump~|~Combat Nudge~]; self.replaceskillcard(give[e.timesused%8]); givedice(d);

Name: Drake@nospace
Description: Flee|Please re-enter this combat with|room for another big item

Name: Drake@havespace
Description: Give Bullet|Obtain a Silver Bullet[;]|Restore old skill card

Name: Drake@havespacet
Description: SPACE|Restore your Skill Card|(this should not appear)

Name: Drake@nospacet
Description: NOSPACE|Restore your Skill Card|(this should not appear)

Name: Inspired
Description: INSPIRATION|Delete the first card|in your hand this combat
Script: On Execute: var list = self.getvar(~inspired~); var firstcard = Deck.getcard(0); if(firstcard != null){trace(firstcard.name); list.append(firstcard.name); self.setvar(~inspired~|list); firstcard.delete();}

Name: Calculate@2
Description: Duplicate dice|[grey](Reuseable... but prone to errors)

Name: Calculate@3
Description: Duplicate dice|[grey](Reuseable... but prone to errors)

Name: Calculate@4
Description: Duplicate dice|[grey](Reuseable... but prone to errors)
Script: On Execute: var odds=50; if(getstatusself(~DEBUG~>0){odds=75;} if(chance(odds)){givedice([d|d]);}else{self.textparticle(~CRITICAL ERROR~);for(mydice in self.dicepool){if(mydice.available()){mydice.removedice(self.screenposition()); self.replaceskillcard(~CRITICAL ERROR@9999~); self.changelimitbreak(~Reboot~);} }}

Name: Calculate@0
Description: Duplicate dice|[grey](Reuseable... but prone to errors)

Name: Calculate@1
Description: Duplicate dice|[grey](Reuseable... but prone to errors)

Name: Prep
Description: PREPARE|Become a copy of the|third card in your hand
Script: On Execute: var c = Deck.getcard(2); trace(c); trace(c.name); trace(c.equipment.name); //todo

Name: Hammer@Crisis
Script: On Execute: attack(d | SHOCK); if(d == 6) inflict(SHOCK); if(d < 6) { sfxdamage(target|d); } else { sfxdamage(target|d); sfx(~_shock~|~~|0.2); }
